name: Whack'em
description:
It's a whack-a-mole game with 16 holes, but you only get 6 buttons so you need to use them in combination to whack the right mole. Dislcaimer: your brain may be tied into a knot while trying to figure out how to play this.

Use arrows and Z and X to whack'em on the head. Without pressing Z and X, the arrows will attack the topmost holes. Holding down Z will shift the focus to the leftmost set of holes, now the arrows will hit this set. Holding X will shift to the rightmost set of holes. And how to reach the bottom set of holes? Yup, your worst fears are correct. Pressing both X and Z simultaneously will shift the focus to the bottom set of holes. 

This game was made in a couple of days in Pico-8 and it will not receive any more updates. It's a finished project. 

If you beat my record I want to see it! Right now my record is level 70 (see screenshot, which I took from the Pico-8 game page). And no messing with the source code to cheat! You won't get away with it because I will know! (I will most definitely not know and you will get away with it)
